com.abc

Class Bank

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.abc.Bank

  • public class Bank
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the object for the Bank. It contains an ArrayList of the customers.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Bank()
      This is the constructor it initialises the ArrayList of customers to be empty

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCustomer(Customer customer)
      This function takes a Customer object and adds it the LinkedList of Customers that the bank holds
      java.lang.String customerSummary()
      This function returns a neatly formatted String detailing the Customers at the bank
      void payDailyInterest()
      This function will update all the accounts held by all of the Customers at this bank and add their daily interest..
      double totalInterestPaid()
      This function works out the total amount of interest paid out by the bank to all customers across all accounts

      • Bank

        public Bank()
        This is the constructor it initialises the ArrayList of customers to be empty

    • Method Detail

      • addCustomer

        public void addCustomer(Customer customer)
        This function takes a Customer object and adds it the LinkedList of Customers that the bank holds
        Parameters:
        customer - This is the Customer to be added to the Bank's list of Customers

      • customerSummary

        public java.lang.String customerSummary()
        This function returns a neatly formatted String detailing the Customers at the bank
        Returns:
        A String containing a neatly formatted summary of all of the customers in the LinkedList

      • totalInterestPaid

        public double totalInterestPaid()
        This function works out the total amount of interest paid out by the bank to all customers across all accounts
        Returns:
        A double representing the amount of money to be paid in interest by the bank (per annum using the current amounts in the accounts)

      • payDailyInterest

        public void payDailyInterest()
        This function will update all the accounts held by all of the Customers at this bank and add their daily interest..
